org.darkphoenixs.pool

接口 ConnectionPool<T>

  • 所有超级接口:
    Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    HbaseConnectionPool, HbaseSharedConnPool, JdbcConnectionPool, KafkaConnectionPool, KafkaSharedConnPool, RedisClusterConnPool, RedisConnectionPool, RedisConnectionPoolOld, RedisSentinelConnPool, RedisSentinelConnPoolOld, RedisShardedConnPool, RedisShardedConnPoolOld, SocketConnectionPool

    public interface ConnectionPool<T>
extends Serializable

    Title: ConnectionPool

    Description: 连接池接口

    从以下版本开始:
    2015年9月19日
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Victor
    另请参阅:
    Serializable
